author: The Irish Times
title: UK lockdown: What are the new coronavirus restrictions?
description: The updated advice for Britons include shopping restrictions, exercise limits
content:
What do the new restrictions involve?
In brief: an Italian-style lockdown to force people to stay at home beyond a small range of very limited circumstances. Under the terms explained by UK prime minister Boris Johnson in his TV address, people will only be … [+3498 chars]
